mapper.select: SELECT AD_ID , AD_NAME , START_DT , END_DT , AD_DESC , TOP_ATFL , ATFL_ID , DEL_YN , END_YN , TOP_TYPE , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ADINFOXM WHERE AD_ID = #{AD_ID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AD_ID , CAGO_NAME , PD_ID , PD_NAME , PD_PRICE , SELL_PRICE , PD_DESC , PD_CONS , ATFL_NAME , DEL_YN , OPT_NAME , OPT_PRICE , UNIT_NAME , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , ORD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ADPDIFXM WHERE AD_ID = #{AD_ID} AND DEL_YN = 'N' )
ORDER BY PD_NAME desc
ORDER BY PD_NAME asc
ORDER BY SELL_PRICE desc, PD_NAME asc
ORDER BY SELL_PRICE asc, PD_NAME asc
ORDER BY ORD, CAGO_NAME

SELECT A.CAGO_NAME, A.CNT, A.ORD FROM ( SELECT A.CAGO_NAME, A.CNT, CASE WHEN A.CAGO_NAME = '메인' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS ORD FROM ( SELECT CAGO_NAME, COUNT(PD_ID) CNT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ADPDIFXM WHERE AD_ID = #{AD_ID} AND DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CAGO_NAME ) A ORDER BY A.CAGO_NAME ) A ORDER BY A.ORD, A.CAGO_NAME
SELECT B.* FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM A, POLARBEAR.TB_COATFLXD B WHERE A.PD_CODE = #{PD_CODE} AND A.ATFL_ID = B.ATFL_ID AND A.RPIMG_SEQ = B.ATFL_SEQ

SELECT AD_ID , AD_NAME , START_DT , END_DT , AD_DESC , TOP_ATFL , ATFL_ID , DEL_YN , END_YN , TOP_TYPE , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ADINFOXM WHERE AD_ID IN (SELECT MAX(AD_ID) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ADINFOXM WHERE REGP_ID = #{REGP_ID} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND END_YN = 'N' )
